text: USERNAME @AppleSupport Me too am suffering , hope the can find a solution
USERNAME We can help. Which version of iOS are you on? You can find that in Settings > General > About. Reply in DM. URL
I just updated my phone and suddenly everything takes ages to load wtf USERNAME this update sux I hate it fix it bye
USERNAME Thanks for reaching out to us. We are always happy to help. Send us a DM so we can look into this together. URL
@AppleSupport after the 11.0.2 my phone just sucks most of the apps are broken, wifi disconnects frequently #apple #ios1102 #painfulupdate
USERNAME We'd love to help! Please DM us and let us know any steps you've tried since experiencing these behaviors. URL
Okay USERNAME I used my fucking phone for 2 minutes and it drains it down 8 fucking percent
USERNAME Battery life is important, and we're here for you. DM us the iOS version your iPhone is running. We'll go from there. URL
You've paralysed my phone with your update USERNAME grrrrrrrrrr
USERNAME We'd be happy to help. Send us a DM and we can start there. URL
@AppleSupport Can you get my iPhone 7plus back on the old iOS please?  Battery runs out in half the time, apps now frequently crash.
USERNAME Thanks for reaching out to us. We are always happy to help. Send us a DM so we can look into this together. URL
So the new USERNAME update does not let me listen to music and go on whatsapp at the same time?!?
USERNAME We'd like to help. What happens when you try to listen to Apple Music & use WhatsApp? Does the music pause? Let us know in DM. URL
@AppleSupport Latest version  I have read the help page turned off virtually all apps and location svs too - but in typing this I dropped 3% life
@AppleSupport Super help - problem solved  once again in love with Apple

Took my phone off charge at 7:20am.

8:03am - 60% battery remaining.

USERNAME plz I beg you, sort your battery life out
USERNAME Thanks for reaching out to us. We are always happy to help. Send us a DM so we can look into this together. URL
My apps stop working without warning and my phone freezes every five minutes! Love the new update USERNAME!!!!
USERNAME We'd like to help if we can. When did this start happening? Which version of iOS are you running currently?
@AppleSupport I have the latest version iOS. It started immediately after I updated my phone.
USERNAME Is there a particular app that seems to cause these issues more than others? What model iPhone are you using? Join us in DM. URL
